main event: A witness observed a yellowish-bright object in the sky over Spring Valley, Ohio, that appeared to be rotating and dimming, resembling the moon.
interesting points: The object was described as having a dark wide band bulging on one side., The object changed direction and altitude during the observation., The witness reported the object moving both behind and in front of a cloud., The object was estimated to be approximately 1500 mph and 0.5 miles away., The report was made under Project Blue Book, which documents UFO sightings.
sighted object: a yellowish-bright rotating object resembling the moon
witness description: Female, age 40, details not fully disclosed.
